8.11 DUIM-Gadgets Module

viewport-region

Generic function

Summary

Returns the region for the specified viewport.

Signature

viewport-region viewport => region

Arguments

viewport
An instance of type <viewport>.

Values

region
An instance of type <region>.

Library

duim-gadgets

Module

duim-gadgets

Description

Returns the region for viewport.

Example

To return the region for a viewport *viewer*:

viewport-region(*viewer*);

See also

<viewport>, page 693

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
